package.name: Vantaye Extension
package.shortDescription: An inofficial extension of Surenix's Vantaye theme.

descriptionlist.description: This is an inofficial extension of Surenix's theme "Vantaye".
It currently contains 83 icons. Screenshots will follow soon. It was developed for iOS 14.x, so some icons might not work on earlier versions due to changes in bundle-IDs.
